artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Author: Kōkyōan Kasen; Publisher: Ōhashiya Yashichi; Carver: Egawa Ichigorō
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: yellow cover; two color images at beginning, one of an explosion with figures flying in the air, and the other features a man doing a trick with a ball, while two people look on from behind bars; black and white images in rest of book with men holding weapons, decapitated heads, or fighting, with patterned clothing, some with tattoos
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Embroidered Portraits of Characters from the ‘Tales of the Water Margin’ (Shūzō suiko meimeiden 繡像水滸銘々傳)
title: Embroidered Portraits of Characters from the ‘Tales of the Water Margin,’ vol. 1
